definition: A trading engine reference determines which trading system shall be evaluated by the trading bot to run the trading session.

paragraphs.text: How the Trading System Reference Works
In other words, the trading system reference lets the process instance know which trading rules to process for the given session.
To add a trading ensystemgine reference, select Add Missing Children on the trading session node menu.
After adding a trading system reference node, make sure you establish the reference to the corresponding trading system hierarchy.
